raw_comment:
I noticed that in the graph for the world electricity had a growth overtime, specifically of fossil fuels, where as in the United States, it relatively remained the same over time. In India the electricity is predominantly fossil and there is little clean electricity. China had the largest spike over time.
I wonder what causes countries like India to only produce fossil electricity. I also wonder which countries contribute the most to the fossil electricity. 
This affects my community because it shows the amount of bad electricity that is contributed to the world and shows how it affects global warming.
"Create more clean energy!"
ace_sentences: A graph shows world electricity over time.
Fossil-fuel electricity in the world increased over time.
A graph shows electricity in the United States over time.
Electricity in the United States remained relatively the same over time.
A graph shows electricity in India.
Electricity in India is predominantly fossil-fuel electricity.
A graph shows electricity in China over time.
China had the largest spike over time.
I wonder what causes India to produce only fossil-fuel electricity.
I wonder which countries contribute the most fossil-fuel electricity.
This situation shows the amount of bad electricity that is contributed to the world.
We should create more clean energy.
